txt.en: You have turned in a stack of trophies for a modest reward suitable for a collector such as yourself.
Wanted: Heavy sword sheaths from the brigands north of Oatbarton. You can make the delivery to Ponto Oats at Oatbarton centre.
'These will surely calm some of the nerves around the town.'
'Pushing the Big Folk out of Dwaling is a concern to all of here in Oatbarton. Do you think you could help show that we are making some headway?'
Mathom Society Task: Heavy Sword Sheaths
The townsfolk in Oatbarton await the delivery of heavy sword sheaths to Ponto Oats at the centre of the town.
Deliver the heavy sword sheaths to Ponto Oats at Oatbarton
You have been tasked with collecting and delivering heavy sword sheaths from the brigands north of Oatbarton. You are to deliver the items to Ponto Oats at the centre of the town of Oatbarton.
Wanted: Heavy sword sheaths from the brigands north of Oatbarton.
